Home.title: Welcome to Hanber's DeFi DApp
Home.LaunchPad: Launch and participate in token sales
Home.Pool: Add/Remove liquidity and earn LP tokens

info.title: How it works
info.second: Enter amount and get instant quote
info.warning: High price impact! Consider a smaller amount

slippage.title: What is slippage?
slippage.explain: Slippage is the difference between expected and actual trade price. Your transaction will revert if the price changes unfavorably by more than this percentage.

Pool.intro: Add or remove liquidity to earn trading fees

info.title: How it works
info.first: Add liquidity in a 1:1 ratio to earn trading fees
info.second: Receive LP tokens representing your pool share
info.third: Remove liquidity anytime by burning LP tokens
info.last: Earn 0.3% fee on all swaps proportional to your share

Bridge.title: Bridge
Bridge.warnText: The transfer status is simulated. A real cross-chain bridge needs to integrate cross-chain protocols such as LayerZero and Wormhole.

info.title: How it works
info.first: Choose the source chain and the target chain, and ensure they are different.
info.second: Enter the amount of tokens you want to transfer.
info.third: Please confirm that the receiving address is correct (default is the current wallet address).
info.fourth: Cross-chain transfers require a certain transaction fee.
info.fifth: The transfer time depends on the confirmation speed of the source chain and the target chain.
info.sixth: Please do not close the page during the transfer process.
